firefox-accounts-toolbar-button-badge.userFacingDescription: This experiment measures the impact of showing the Firefox Accounts toolbar button by default for signed-out users.

next-generation-accessibility-engine-pow.userFacingName: Next generation accessibility engine powering screen readers
next-generation-accessibility-engine-pow.userFacingDescription: Evaluating a major re-architecture of Firefox's accessibility engine to improve performance of screen readers and other assistive technologies.

use-additional-tiles-for-sponsored-short.userFacingName: Use additional tiles for Sponsored Shortcuts
use-additional-tiles-for-sponsored-short.userFacingDescription: A rollout that is intended to optimize the advertising performance on the New Tab page. An alternative sponsored tile could be used when a user dismissed the original one.
